title: Average value of a function on an interval

content.prompt: If the average value of a continuous function f on the interval [−2, 4 ] is 12, what is  ∫ − 2 4 f ( x ) 8   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@453B@ ?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
